original_text: And Saul and Jonathan his son and the people who were present with them stayed in Geba of Benjamin, but the Philistines encamped in Michmash.
korean_text: 사울과 그의 아들 요나단과 그들과 함께 한 백성은 베냐민 게바에 있고 블레셋 사람들은 믹마스에 진 쳤더니

sentences.original_text: And Saul and Jonathan his son
and the people who were present with them
but the Philistines encamped in Michmash
